description: joined as the 5th employee, grew to over 50 employees. influenced early architecture and cultural decisions such as the UI and codebase. created and owned many key areas such as onboarding, discovery and settings.
descriptive_points: created and evolved onboarding process as user needs changed using react, next.js, typescript, xstate, django and graphql
introduced component testing of our design library using storybook and chromatic as the first frontend engineer
educated frontend team on web accessibility which resulted in real improvements to web app
